patthana23.4:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana23.4:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.4:5.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana23.4:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.4:6.3: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha … pe … āsevane tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
